Solution Steps: 1. Check power supply to fan. 2. Inspect fan for blockages. 3. Replace fan motor.
Safety Note: Disconnect all power before servicing the unit.

Solution Steps: 1. Clean air filters. 2. Ensure proper ventilation around the unit. 3. Check coolant levels.
Safety Note: Surfaces may be hot. Allow the unit to cool before touching internal components.

Solution Steps: 1. Check for loose panels or screws. 2. Inspect fan blades for damage. 3. Lubricate motor bearings if applicable.
